headline: New Glarus Brewing Company wins big at World Beer Cup | News | wkow.com
context: NEW GLARUS, Wis. (WKOW) — Thursday night the New Glarus Brewing Company took home three medals at the International World Beer Cup.
In the Belgian fruit beer category, Brewmaster Dan Carey struck both gold and silver for his spontaneously fermented Belgian-style fruit beer Kriek (Gold) and Champ Du Blanc (Silver).
